mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Letter from Helene Wohlgemuth to Mr. and Mrs. Rosenblatt

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A letter from Helene Wohlgemuth reassuring concerned parents of a Polk State School resident in the aftermath of Superintendent Dr. James McClelland's dismissal.
